message.body: (1/2)Just got home... drive back a bit different than the ride up :) just wanted to say that it was great to see you and thank you for a great time and the
Sorry I missed your messages. I crashed early last night. Thank YOU for visiting! I had a great time, especially watching you participate in baseball-related activities, hee hee
And thanks for the bluecoat too :-)
Thanks for telling me to talk to my dad. You were right.
(1/2)I'm really glad to hear it. I knew that it had to be the stress of it all. Although me giving correct advice is pretty much the final sign of the Mayan
Ha! Well, we still have a couple of months, right? I'm going to find a place where I can rent a Barracuda.
Grab me a jeep while you're there :)
